Kirsten Gillibrand ( D-N.Y.) visited Gabrielle Giffords at a rehabilitation hospital in Houston. Kirsten Gillibrand reported Gabrielle Giffords "continues to defy the odds" and is recovering at a rapid pace.

In 1987, Mr Baker( now Lord Baker) said a national curriculum was needed because we can no longer leave individual teachers, schools or local authorities to devise the curriculum that children should follow .
